elements.name: question1
elements.title: You can withdraw from all contracts at any time, you simply have to cancel in writing.

elements.name: Frage2
elements.title: Reason
elements.correctAnswer: Continuing obligations (employment contracts, rental agreements) can indeed be terminated. But not, for example, purchase contracts!

elements.name: question19
elements.title: Stefanie buys a tasting box (40 bottles) of Trojka Green Ice for CHF 122 at a wine fair from drinks retailer G. The next day she realizes that she doesn't actually want these bottles - she wants her money back. Because this is a door-to-door sale, the wine merchant is obliged to refund her money.

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Reason
elements.correctAnswer: Stefanie buys the drinks at a wine fair. This means that one of the requirements of a door-to-door sales transaction is not met. The surprise effect does not apply. This is only the case if the offer is made at the following locations (OR 40b): Workplace, home or immediate vicinity, public transportation, public streets or squares, promotional event that was connected with an excursion or similar occasion, telephone or via comparable means of simultaneous oral telecommunication.
